CreateUser.apiDescription: Creates a new user account if few pre-defined conditions are met

type.description: The type of account to be created (Default: 1) [1=Buyer, 2=Merchant, 3=Delivery Partner, 4=Administrator].

dob.description: Date of Birth of the user.

status.description: The initial status of the account (Default: 1) [0=Pending Activation, 1=Active, 2=Suspended].

mname.description: Middle name of the user (if any).

http.title: HTTP
http.sample:
POST https://sample.padocs.com/admin/accounts/user/createadmin/accounts/user/create HTTP/2
	Accept: application/json
	Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
	Authorization: 4B2BB00E-595A-4973-8D60-61B0F59B289
	X-Requested-With: 5C349D9C-1355-4115-A7E2-33985860B41A

	type=1&uname=amanda&password=12345&fname=Amanda&lname=Jones&sex=Female&dob=December+20%2C+2020&mobile=%2B919876543210&email=amanda%40demo.indiosco.com&status=1

java.title: Java

php_curl.title: PHP (cURL)
php_curl.sample:
<?php
$curl = curl_init();
curl_setopt_array($curl, [
	CURLOPT_URL => 'https://sample.padocs.com/admin/accounts/user/create',
	CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
	CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
	CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
	CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
	CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
	CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_2_1,
	CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
	CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => 'type=1&uname=amanda&password=12345&fname=Amanda&lname=Jones&sex=Female&dob=December+20%2C+2020&mobile=%2B919876543210&email=amanda%40demo.indiosco.com&status=1',
	CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
		'Accept: application/json',
		'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
		'Authorization: 4B2BB00E-595A-4973-8D60-61B0F59B289',
		'X-Requested-With: 5C349D9C-1355-4115-A7E2-33985860B41A',
	]
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

DeleteUser.apiDescription: Delete a user account identified by supplied Account ID (UID)

oid.description: The UID of the user to delete.

http.title: HTTP
http.sample:
DELETE /api/admin/accounts/users/create HTTP/2
  Host: mychhotafarm.indiosco.com
  Accept: application/json
  Content-Length: 170
 
  oid=10

java.title: Java

php.title: PHP (cURL)
php.sample:
<?php
 	$curl = curl_init();
 
 	curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
 		CURLOPT_URL => 'https://mychhotafarm.indiosco.com/api/admin/accounts/users/delete',
 		CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
 		CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
 		CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
 		CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
 		CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
 		CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_2_1,
 		CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'DELETE',
 		CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => 'oid=10',
 		CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
 			'Accept: application/json',
 			'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
 			'Authorization: 4B2BB00E-595A-4973-8D60-61B0F59B289',
 			'X-Requested-With: 5C349D9C-1355-4115-A7E2-33985860B41A',
 			'Cookie: PHPSESSID=cndfdtb1g7ok2aobrvkm77cng3'
 		),
 	));
 
 	$response = curl_exec($curl);
 
 	curl_close($curl);
 	echo $response;

UpdateUser.apiDescription: Updates a user account identified by supplied Account ID (UID)

uid.description: The UID of the user to update.

dob.description: Date of Birth of the user.

status.description: The initial status of the account (Default: 1) [0=Pending Activation, 1=Active, 2=Suspended].

mname.description: Middle name of the user (if any).

http.title: HTTP
http.sample:
PUT /api/admin/accounts/users/update HTTP/2
  Host: mychhotafarm.indiosco.com
  Accept: application/json
  Content-Length: 170
 
  uid=10&uname=amanda&password=12345&fname=Amanda&mname=&lname=Jones&sex=Female&dob=December%2020%2C%201999&mobile=%2B919876543210&email=amanda%40demo.indiosco.com&status=1

java.title: Java

php.title: PHP (cURL)
php.sample:
<?php
 	$curl = curl_init();
 
 	curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
 		CURLOPT_URL => 'https://mychhotafarm.indiosco.com/api/admin/accounts/users/update',
 		CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
 		CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
 		CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
 		CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
 		CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
 		CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_2_1,
 		CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'PUT',
 		CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => 'uid=10&uname=amanda&password=12345&fname=Amanda&mname=&lname=Jones&sex=Female&dob=December%2020%2C%201999&mobile=%2B919876543210&email=amanda%40demo.indiosco.com&status=1',
 		CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
 			'Accept: application/json',
 			'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
 			'Authorization: 4B2BB00E-595A-4973-8D60-61B0F59B289',
 			'X-Requested-With: 5C349D9C-1355-4115-A7E2-33985860B41A',
 			'Cookie: PHPSESSID=cndfdtb1g7ok2aobrvkm77cng3'
 		),
 	));
 
 	$response = curl_exec($curl);
 
 	curl_close($curl);
 	echo $response;

CreateAddress.apiDescription: Creates a new address and stores it in the user's AddressBook

type.description: The type of address to be created (Default: 1) [1=Residential, 2=Commercial].

street.description: The name. of the street of the address

country.description: The name of the country where the address is located.

state.description: The name of the state where the address is located.

city.description: The name of the city where the address is located.

http.title: HTTP
http.sample:
POST /api/user/adressbook/create HTTP/2
  Host: mychhotafarm.indiosco.com
  Accept: application/json
  Content-Length: 170
 
  type=1&uname=amanda&password=12345&fname=Amanda&mname=&lname=Jones&sex=Female&dob=December%2020%2C%201999&mobile=%2B919876543210&email=amanda%40demo.indiosco.com&status=1

 		),
 	));

 	echo $response;
